meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or consisting of excrement.
meanings.sent1: The excrementitious smell filled the room.
meanings.sent2: The bathroom had an excrementitious odor.
meanings.sent3: The excrementitious mess on the floor was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The excrementitious nature of the compost pile was evident.
meanings.sent5: The excrementitious stain was impossible to remove.

meanings.sent1: The excrementitious bin was overflowing with garbage.
meanings.sent2: The excrementitious water was polluted with toxins.
meanings.sent3: The excrementitious trash can was attracting flies.
meanings.sent4: The excrementitious pond was a breeding ground for bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The excrementitious landfill was a health hazard.

meanings.sent1: The excrementitious factory released harmful pollutants.
meanings.sent2: The excrementitious soil was contaminated with chemicals.
meanings.sent3: The excrementitious factory was a stinky place to work.
meanings.sent4: The excrementitious air quality was a concern for residents.
meanings.sent5: The excrementitious waste management system needed improvement.
